items.title: Collaborative Task Creation and Assignment
items.description: Enable users to create tasks, assign them to team members, and set deadlines within shared projects.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a new task with title, description, assignee, and due date fields
Assigned team members receive a notification upon task assignment
Tasks are visible to all members of the shared project
dependencies: User authentication and team management module
non_functional: System should handle up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation
Task creation and assignment actions should complete within 2 seconds

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about core collaboration features such as shared projects, notifications, and visibility.
